headline20: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 12 airports right now.
management45: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 12 airports right now. No engine anti-ice operations are currently flagged. Across base airports: 4 critical, 16 high, 8 medium, 11 normal. Key bases needing attention include London Luton (LTN/EGGW), London Gatwick (LGW/EGKK) and Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR); plus 17 other bases. 8 additional base airports are at medium severity and should be monitored closely. At base airports, the dominant pattern is snow-related runway contamination risk, mist and low cloud base  — most notably around Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD), Modlin (WMI/EPMO) and Poznań-Ławica (POZ/EPPO). Network hotspots: Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB), Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH), Billund (BLL/EKBI), Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD), Lublin (LUZ/EPLB) and 7 others. Primary drivers: low cloud base, snow / blowing snow and RVR limitations. Expected impact is reduced runway capacity with higher delay and diversion risk, especially where visibility/RVR and cloud base are very low. Since the last update, 12 airports changed status, led by Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB), Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH), Billund (BLL/EKBI) and 9 others.
detail90: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 12 airports right now. Base airports (focus): London Luton (LTN/EGGW) — HIGH: mist; visibility down to 2 km, cloud base around 300 ft | London Gatwick (LGW/EGKK) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 700 m, cloud base around 100 ft | Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 500 m, cloud base around 200 ft | Chişinău (RMO/LUKK) — HIGH: mist; runway contamination risk; cold-temperature performance penalties | Bucharest Henri Coandă (OTP/LROP) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 600 m, cloud base around 100 ft | Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD) — CRIT: freezing fog; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties and 14 others. Worst affected now: Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB) — CRIT: freezing fog; snow; visibility down to 300 m, RVR down to 450 m, cloud base around 100 ft (drivers: low-visibility procedures (reduced capacity), low-visibility takeoff restrictions, runway visual range (RVR) constraints) | Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH) — CRIT: fog; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: runway visual range (RVR) constraints, approach minima limits, runway contamination / reduced braking) | Billund (BLL/EKBI) — CRIT: mist; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings, mist) | Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD) — CRIT: freezing fog; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: runway visual range (RVR) constraints, cold-temperature performance penalties, very low visibility) | Lublin (LUZ/EPLB) — CRIT: fog; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: low-visibility takeoff restrictions, runway visual range (RVR) constraints, approach minima limits) | Modlin (WMI/EPMO) — CRIT: freezing fog; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: low-visibility procedures (reduced capacity), runway visual range (RVR) constraints, runway contamination / reduced braking) and 6 others. Changed since last run: Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB), Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH), Billund (BLL/EKBI), Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD), Lublin (LUZ/EPLB), Modlin (WMI/EPMO), Poznań-Ławica (POZ/EPPO), Olsztyn-Mazury (SZY/EPSY), Kaunas (KUN/EYKA), Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV) and 2 others.
